original: MJÖBNE, Hans E, Disponent, Sjuntorp, f Alingsås 3/10 83, gm Vanja Lilljegren. Hal. Kont i ag.fma i Gbg 98—05, h Claes Johansson & C:os Väfveri AB (nu Mölnlycke Väfveri AB) Gbg 05—09, korresp o inköpsch där 09— 17, kont.ch h AB Sjuntorp 17—20, disp där sed. 20 samt styr.suppl. Styr.led i Konfektions AB Älgen, Sjuntorp.
translated: MJÖBNE, Hans E, Managing Director, Sjuntorp, born Alingsås 3/10 83, married to Vanja Lilljegren. Started as a clerk in a trading company in Gothenburg from 1898 to 1905, worked for Claes Johansson & C:os Väfveri AB (now Mölnlycke Väfveri AB) in Gothenburg from 1905 to 1909, as a correspondent and purchaser there from 1909 to 1917. Became chief accountant of AB Sjuntorp from 1917 to 1920, promoted to Managing Director from 1920 onwards and also served as a board member. Additionally, served as a board member in Konfektions AB Älgen, Sjuntorp.

career.workplace: Claes Johansson & C:os Väfveri AB (now Mölnlycke Väfveri AB)
Claes Johansson & C:os Väfveri AB (now Mölnlycke Väfveri AB)
